batch_upsert_max_objects_per_batch.description: The maximum number of objects that may appear within a single batch in a /v2/catalog/batch-upsert request.

batch_upsert_max_total_objects.description: The maximum number of objects that may appear across all batches in a /v2/catalog/batch-upsert request.

batch_retrieve_max_object_ids.description: The maximum number of object IDs that may appear in a /v2/catalog/batch-retrieve request.

search_max_page_limit.description: The maximum number of results that may be returned in a page of a /v2/catalog/search response.

batch_delete_max_object_ids.description: The maximum number of object IDs that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/batch-delete request.

update_item_taxes_max_item_ids.description: The maximum number of item IDs that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-taxes request.

update_item_taxes_max_taxes_to_enable.description: The maximum number of tax IDs to be enabled that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-taxes request.

update_item_taxes_max_taxes_to_disable.description: The maximum number of tax IDs to be disabled that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-taxes request.

update_item_modifier_lists_max_item_ids.description: The maximum number of item IDs that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-modifier-lists request.

update_item_modifier_lists_max_modifier_.description: The maximum number of modifier list IDs to be enabled that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-modifier-lists request.
The maximum number of modifier list IDs to be disabled that may be included in a single /v2/catalog/update-item-modifier-lists request.

standard_unit_description_group.description: The set of standard unit descriptions.
